title: Seattle City Council Special Joint Meeting with Select Labor Committee & Community Police Commission
description:
The Gender Equity, Safe Communities, New Americans, & Education Committee holds a special joint meeting and public hearing with the Select Labor Committee and Community Police Commission. Agenda: Introduction to Collective Bargaining with the Seattle Police Officers' Guild (SPOG); Presentations by the Civilian Oversight Entities; Public Hearing on Collective Bargaining with the Seattle Police Officers' Guild.
Advance to a specific part
Introduction to Collective Bargaining with the Seattle Police Officers' Guild (SPOG) - 3:58
Presentations by the Civilian Oversight Entities - 8:57
Public Hearing on Collective Bargaining with the Seattle Police Officers' Guild (Public Comment) - 34:43
